about_the_game:
Discover the magical Winter Wonderland with Mika and Windstorm! Experience exciting new sleigh and snowball missions, and many new collectibles to discover.

 

Help Mrs. Kaltenbach prepare for the winter fair by setting up stalls and decorating the courtyard with sparkling lights. Load Mika’s sleigh with gifts and explore the snowy Alpine region, discovering new areas and festive activities along the way.

 

From thrilling sleigh rides and action-packed snowball challenges to relaxing horseback rides through the snowy landscape, Winter Wonderland has something for every player to enjoy.

 

Features:

  • Ride with Windstorm through a beautiful winter landscape

  • 24 new main missions and 12 new side missions, like sleigh and snowball missions

  • Special winter outfits for Mika and Windstorm

  • Find new hidden collectibles

  • Earn 10 extra achievements
